sentence.Network_en: For parotid pain, aspirin or codeine is quite effective.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿司匹林或可待因治腮腺疼痛非常有效.

sentence.Network_en: Other causes of parotid swelling are suppurative parotitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 腮腺肿胀的其它原因是化浓性腮腺炎.

sentence.Network_en: Infected mandibular, parotid and anterior cervical nodes usually cause subcutaneous induration and surface bulging.
sentence.Network_cn: 感染的下颌, 耳下和颈前淋巴结,通常引起皮下硬结和表面突起.
